column1: Nancy Pelosi is finally sending the articles of impeachment to the Senate. Join me to encourage a fair and SPEEDY impeachment trial so we can get back to work on the issues that matter most! https://t.co/KFG4BekrL3 https://t.co/TtxAwlCgEY
